name: First-Aid Squad
effectText: Target 1 Normal Monster in your Graveyard; add it to your hand. When a Normal Monster is destroyed by battle: You can Special Summon this card from your Graveyard in Defense Position as a Normal Monster (Warrior-Type/EARTH/Level 3/ATK 1200/DEF 400). (This card is NOT treated as a Trap Card.) You can only use this effect of "First-Aid Squad" once per turn. If Summoned this way, banish this card when it leaves the field.
